golad.lib.impl

Class DefaultBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • golad.lib.impl.AbstractBoard
      • golad.lib.impl.AbstractMutableBoard
        • golad.lib.impl.DefaultBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Board, MutableBoard

    public class DefaultBoard
extends AbstractMutableBoard
    A basic implementation of a MutableBoard.
    Author:
    Megacrafter127
    See Also:
    Board, MutableBoard, AbstractBoard, AbstractMutableBoard

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultBoard

        public DefaultBoard(int w,
            int h,
            CellState init)
             throws NullPointerException,
                    IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new board with the specified width and height, initializing each cell with the provided CellState.
        Parameters:
        w - The width of the new board
        h - The height of the new board
        init - The initial CellState of each cell on this board
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If init is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - If w or h are less than 0.

      • DefaultBoard

        public DefaultBoard(int w,
            int h)
             throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new board with the specified with and height. Each cell is initialized as CellState.DEAD.
        Parameters:
        w - The width of the new board
        h - The height of the new board
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If w or h are less than 0.

      • DefaultBoard

        public DefaultBoard(Board src)
        Creates a copy of the provided Board.
        Parameters:
        src - The Board to copy.

        public CellState getCellStateAt(int x,
                       int y)
                         throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Description copied from interface: Board
        Returns the current state of the cell at the specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the probed cell
        y - The Y coordinate of the probed cell
        Returns:
        the state of the probed cell
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the specified coordinates are outside of this board.

      • setCellStateAt

        public CellState setCellStateAt(int x,
                       int y,
                       CellState newState)
                         throws NullPointerException,
                                IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Description copied from interface: MutableBoard
        Changes the state of a cell.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the cell
        y - The Y coordinate of the cell
        newState - The new state the cell should have
        Returns:
        the previous state of the cell
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If newState is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the specified coordinates are outside of this board.

      • iterate

        public MutableBoard iterate()
        Description copied from interface: Board
        Generates the state of this Board after one iteration of GOLAD, and returns a Board containing it. Preferably the returned Board should be of the same class as this Board.
        Returns:
        a Board in the state which this board would be in after one iteration of GOLAD.
